content: Hello, I need help with my heating system, is this XYZ home services?
Hello! You have reached XYZ Home Services, we handle plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services. Could you please tell me your name so we can assist you?
Oops, I think I might have dialed the wrong number. Sorry about that!
No worries at all. I'll mark this as a wrong number. If you need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
